Welcome back! You shared the result of the application.
Welcome back! You did not share the result of the application.

string-array.name: effect
string-array.item: Tonic; acts in the same direction as the red, but weaker; accelerates the pulsation of blood, improves digestion
Toning, physiologically optimal, least tiring; stimulates vision and nervous activity
Physiologically optimal; reduces blood pressure and expands capillaries; calms and relieves neuralgia and migraines; for a long time increases muscular-muscular performance
Calming; reduces muscular tension and blood pressure, calms the pulse and slows the rhythm of breathing
Soothing action turns into a depressing; promotes inhibition of functions of human physiological systems
Connects the effect of red and blue colors; produces depressing action on the nervous system
